title: FS: N28 Kelly, Ward, Comiskey, Clarkson & Cody in PSA & SGC Ex to Ex+ for sale
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS: N28 Kelly, Ward, Comiskey, Clarkson & Cody in PSA & SGC Ex to Ex+ for sale
posts.post_content:
I have the following N28 baseball HOFers and William "Buffalo Bill" Cody for sale:

John Clarkson - $995 - SGC 70
Charley Comiskey - $995 - PSA 5
King Kelly - $1095 - PSA 5
John Ward - $995 - PSA 5
Buffalo Bill Cody - $595 - SGC 70

All cards have nice eye appeal and no paper loss (which you sometimes see on the backs of even graded cards).  Email me at [url]Eangyal@roadrunner.com[/url] for high resolution scans.  These are all nice for their grade.  Multiple references available upon request.  Thanks for looking.  Eric

Bumped for a set break and individual prices are listed.

Thanks,

Eric
